Description.Text:
Position The hotel structure is close to restaurants, bars, shops and has direct and private access to the beach. It's easy to rich by walk the touristic seaport of Riccione and the famous Viale Ceccarini streat situated in downtown.
Restaurant Air conditioned restaurant.
More Informations Last refurbishment has took place on 2008.
Sweet and salty Buffet breakfast. For meals clients have a choice between 2 different menus + mixed buffet + fruit or dessert.
From 22/06/13 to 23/08/13: once a week hotel organize a party.
ALL INCLUSIVE TREATMENT INCLUDES: unlimited beverages at meals (water, wine, soft drinks) + beach service including 1 sun-umbrella per room + 2 sunbeds per room, for the single room 1 sun-umbrella per room + 1 sunbed per room.
CHECK IN: from 12.00 (midday). CHECK OUT: until 9.00am
